artist: Artist: After Innocenzio Francucci; Delineator: N. Angiolini; Engraver: Giuseppe Rosaspina
description: two women seated holding baby boys, all with halos; foreground left woman kneeling, foreground right man kneeling looking back at viewer;in a room, window at right
inscription:
Signature, Title, and Inscription

below image in black: [Inn\'zo Francucci da Imola   N. Angiolini dis.  G. Rosaspina inc./ LA SACRA FAMIGLIA/ E DUE RITRATTI];  on sheet in pencil lower left: [1-581]
title: La Sacra Famiglia e Due Ritratti
